items.title: Apple might be building its own AI ‘answer engine’
items.description: Apple is reportedly working to create a lightweight competitor to ChatGPT.

items.title: Mastercard denies pressuring game platforms, Valve tells a different story
items.description: Mastercard seemingly denied playing a role in a recent marketplace crackdown on games with adult content, while Valve says the pressure was indirect.

items.title: SAP is acquiring SmartRecruiters
items.description: SAP has reached an agreement to acquire SmartRecruiters, with SmartRecruiters' software complementing SAP's existing HR tools.

items.title: Inside OpenAI’s quest to make AI do anything for you
items.description: OpenAI developed the first AI reasoning model less than a year ago, but the technology has shifted Silicon Valley's focus to agents.

items.title: The uproar over Vogue’s AI-generated ad isn’t just about fashion
items.description: “Modeling as a profession is already challenging enough without having to compete with now new digital standards of perfection that can be achieved wi...
